info.name: Nimbuspost Partners API
info.description:
Getting Started

Follow below given steps to get started:

Authentication

Use your email and password to generate token using Users->Login endpoint.

Use generated token in request header as Authorization: Bearer {token} with each API request.

Support

  • All the necessary information on integration is laid out in this document. Please read it thoroughly.

  • For any integration and API related support, you can feel free to drop us an email attech@nimbuspost.com.

Request Format

Any data sent in any API endpoints is raw JSON format. No POST/GET data is accepted.

request.description:
Use this API endpoint to generate autorization token.

Parameters:

Params Required Data Type Description/Example
email Yes string abc@mail.com
password Yes string 123456789

body.raw:
{
    "order_number": "#001",
    "shipping_charges": 40,
    "discount": 100,
    "cod_charges": 30,
    "payment_type": "cod",
    "order_amount": 1000,
    "package_weight": 300,
    "package_length": 10,
    "package_breadth": 10,
    "package_height": 10,
    "request_auto_pickup" : "yes",
    "consignee": {
        "name": "Customer Name",
        "address": "190, ABC Road",
        "address_2": "Near Bus Stand",
        "city": "Mumbai",
        "state": "Maharastra",
        "pincode": "400001",
        "phone": "9999999999"
    },
    "pickup": {
        "warehouse_name": "warehouse 1",
        "name" : "Vikalp Sharma",
        "address": "140, MG Road",
        "address_2": "Near metro station",
        "city": "Gurgaon",
        "state": "Haryana",
        "pincode": "122001",
        "phone": "9999999999"
    },
    "order_items": [
        {
            "name": "product 1",
            "qty": "18",
            "price": "100",
            "sku": "sku001"
        }
    ],
    "courier_id" : "1",
    "is_insurance" : "0",
    "tags" : "tag1, tag2"
}

request.description:
Use this API endpoint to generate AWB/tracking number for your order.

Note: Order total is not automatically calculated in API request. Be sure to input the correct calculated order_amount.

Parameters:

Params Required Description Example
order_number Yes string - max length: 20 1234
payment_type Yes Valid Values - cod, prepaid & reverse cod
package_weight No Weight in grams 400
package_length No Package length in cm. 12
package_breadth No Package breadth in cm. 12
package_height No Package height in cm. 12
request_auto_pickup No Use Yes to send auto pickup request to courier. Yes
shipping_charges No Shipping chages applied. 40
cod_charges No COD chages applied. 40
discount No Discount applied. 40
order_amount Yes Total Order Amont. 999
consignee[name] Yes String - max length: 200 Amit Kumar
consignee[company_name] No String - max length: 200 ABC Company
consignee[address] Yes String - max length: 200 140, ABC Road
consignee[address_2] No String - max length: 200 Near Metro Station
consignee[city] Yes String - max length: 40 Gurgaon
consignee[state] Yes String - max length: 40 Haryana
consignee[pincode] Yes 6 digit numeric 122002
consignee[phone] Yes 10 digit numeric 9999999999
pickup[warehouse_name] Yes String - max length: 20 Warehouse 1
pickup[name] Yes String - max length: 200 Amit Kumar
pickup[address] Yes String - max length: 200 140, ABC Road
pickup[address_2] No String - max length: 200 Near Metro Station
pickup[city] Yes String - max length: 40 Gurgaon
pickup[state] Yes String - max length: 40 Haryana
pickup[pincode] Yes 6 digit numeric 122002
pickup[phone] Yes 10 digit numeric 9999999999
pickup[gst_umber] No 15 digit alpha numeric 18AABCU9603R1ZM
is_rto_different No When Pickup & RTO address are different.
If yes then rto[] array is required.
Valid values - yes,no		 no
rto[warehouse_name] Conditional String - max length: 20 Warehouse 1
rto[name] Conditional String - max length: 200 Amit Kumar
rto[address] Conditional String - max length: 200 140, ABC Road
rto[address_2] Conditional String - max length: 200 Near Metro Station
rto[city] Conditional String - max length: 40 Gurgaon
rto[state] Conditional String - max length: 40 Haryana
rto[pincode] Conditional 6 digit numeric 122002
rto[phone] Conditional 10 digit numeric 9999999999
courier_id No numeric courier id 5
is_insurance 0 numeric 0 or 1 1
tags No comma separated values. max length: 200 tag1, tag2

request.description:
Get the tracking history a particular shipment through this API by passing the Nimbuspost AWB Number in the endpoint URL itself. Type Nimbuspost shipment AWB Number in place of {awb}. No other body parameters are required.

Parameters:

EXAMPLE
../shipments/track/N123456789

Response Status Codes:

Status Code Status
PP Pending Pickup
IT In Transit
EX Exception
OFD Out For Delivery
DL Delivered
RT RTO
RT-IT RTO In Transit
RT-DL RTO Delivered

response.name: Success

request.description: Use this API endpoint to track upto 100 AWBs in one API call.

request.description:
Use this API endpoint to generate AWB/tracking number for Hyperlocal.

Note: Order total is not automatically calculated in API request. Be sure to input the correct calculated order_amount.

Parameters:

Params Required Description Example
order_number Yes string - max length: 20 1234
payment_type Yes Valid Values - cod, prepaid cod
package_weight No Weight in grams 400
package_length No Package length in cm. 12
package_breadth No Package breadth in cm. 12
package_height No Package height in cm. 12
request_auto_pickup No Use Yes to send auto pickup request to courier. Yes
shipping_charges No Shipping chages applied. 40
cod_charges No COD chages applied. 40
discount No Discount applied. 40
order_amount Yes Total Order Amont. 999
consignee[name] Yes String - max length: 200 Amit Kumar
consignee[company_name] No String - max length: 200 ABC Company
consignee[address] Yes String - max length: 200 140, ABC Road
consignee[address_2] No String - max length: 200 Near Metro Station
consignee[city] Yes String - max length: 40 Gurgaon
consignee[state] Yes String - max length: 40 Haryana
consignee[pincode] Yes 6 digit numeric 122002
consignee[phone] Yes 10 digit numeric 9999999999
consignee[latitude] Yes Delivery location latitude 28.48131
consignee[longitude] Yes Delivery location Longitude 28.48131
pickup[warehouse_name] Yes String - max length: 20 Warehouse 1
pickup[name] Yes String - max length: 200 Amit Kumar
pickup[address] Yes String - max length: 200 140, ABC Road
pickup[address_2] No String - max length: 200 Near Metro Station
pickup[city] Yes String - max length: 40 Gurgaon
pickup[state] Yes String - max length: 40 Haryana
pickup[pincode] Yes 6 digit numeric 122002
pickup[phone] Yes 10 digit numeric 9999999999
pickup[gst_umber] No 15 digit alpha numeric 18AABCU9603R1ZM
pickup[latitude] Yes Pickup location latitude 28.48131
pickup[longitude] Yes Pickup location Longitude 28.48131
courier_id No numeric courier id / "autoship" 5
is_insurance 0 numeric 0 or 1 1
tags No comma separated values. max length: 200 tag1, tag2

request.description:
Use this API endpoint to Get the list of available couriers for your account.

No parameters are required.

response.name: Success

request.description:
Use this API endpoint to Get the list of all available pincode with serviceability.

No parameters are required.

header.value: Origin, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, Access-Control-Request-Method, Authorization
GET, POST, OPTIONS, PUT, PATCH, DELETE

request.description:
Use this API endpoint to Check serviceablity and get Freight Charges between origin and destination pincodes.

Parameters:

Params Required Description Example
origin Yes Pickup pincode / integer - length: 6 123456
destination Yes Destination pincode / integer - length: 6 123456
payment_type Yes Valid Values - cod, prepaid cod
order_amount Yes for COD order Total Order Amont. 999
weight No Weight in grams. Default: 500 400
length No Package length in cm. Default: 10 12
breadth No Package breadth in cm. Default: 10 12
height No Package height in cm. Default: 10 12

response.name: Success

request.description:
Use this API endpoint to generate Take action against any AWB. Action against 100 AWBs are allowed in one request.

Note: Action is allowed only when Exception is raised by courier company.

Supported Action Types : re-attempt, change_address, change_phone

Check sample request body for supported action_data for each action type.
